title: New: I Am Harlequin – Wild One
body:
Debuted on last nights episode of hit UK drama Skins, **I Am Harlequin’s** new track _Wild One_ is a touchingly alluring ballad.

There’s a hint of **Adele** about it, with it’s polished pop sensibilities, yet maintaining a level of emotional integrity that the _Someone Like You_ singer often fails to find. Driven by the powerful vocals of **Anne Frier**, _Wild One_ opens out into a full blown, choir backed number, capable of toppling the mightiest of hearts.
